videoData.title: The new sharing of emotions

nodes.whoTheyAre: Clinical psychologist and senior research scientist at Intel, Margaret Morris strives to make technologies that are emotionally helpful. At Intel, she works closely with engineers and designers to promote emotional connectedness and personal change via social media, mobile phones and embedded sensing.

videoData.description: Can a smartphone add a new dimension to fostering mental health? Margaret Morris reveals how subjects successfully interacted with their phones throughout the day -- mapping moods, charting physical responses and getting instant ideas on confronting situations -- and rather than expressing concerns about privacy, they wanted to share their emotions with others.
videoData.socialDescription: Can a smartphone add a new dimension to fostering mental health?
